name: North Sea Inferno
overview: A North Sea platform is menaced by terrorists, they have taken hostages and they have placed a nuclear bomb somewhere, attempting to extort the government. You are ordered as a special agent to free the hostages and to defuse the bomb. But you are not helpless because you can dispose of some different weapons. You only have 30 minutes to fulfill your mission. ON the way you are led through a labyrinth of corridors, stairs, lifts and rooms, this means that this mission demands intelligence, good reactions and a good orientation.
